title: Bringers of Fire
text: The Bringers of Fire are a [[Seren]] tribe that was founded by a chaotic and destructive [[red dragon]]. One of the largest and most dangerous tribes, they are one of the only tribes known to completely exterminate Seren clans that they view as unworthy. The Bringers of Fire paint their skin red before battle and make use of flaming oil. They are renowned for their volatile temperaments.
